column5: There is some Chinese counterfit Power Pro going around. The boxes aren't very good. Here's some info from Shimano
Have you seen these in stores anywhere? or did you just find it online somewhere?
Lots of this stuff going around. Not just line, fake LC cranks, Megabass and a few Lowrance and I have seen3 clone reels(Higher End). They have been doing it for years.
thanks for the heads up 2 R's and i love the signature!
I think the only person that might get fooled by that is Ray Charles..
There was counterfeit stuff a few years ago and the boxes were almost perfectly identical. i think they added a hologram after that.
Well, if it can fool a dead guy then who knows!  The packaging is such a rip-off of PP!
Buh haha oh man Gotta love Made in China Crap
